name: Faerie Dragon
description:
Faerie dragons are playful and elusive creatures with potent breath weapons that cause uncontrollable laughter.

**Combat**: Euphoria breath and trickery.

**Habitat/Society**: Enchanted forests.

**Ecology**: Playful protectors of nature.

name: Fire Elemental
description:
Fire elementals are summoned beings of living flame, capable of setting their enemies ablaze.

**Combat**: Touch ignites targets.

**Habitat/Society**: Elemental Plane of Fire.

**Ecology**: Embodiments of flame and heat.
